name: Whitfield County HHW Facility
materials: Aerosol Spray Cans; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Household Cleaners; Insecticides; Other Batteries; Latex Paint; Paint Thinner; Pesticides; Pool Chemicals; Batteries (Rechargeable); Used Motor Oil; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
This HHW Facility is located at the entrance of the Old Dixie Landfill & Convenience Center. Residential waste only, no commercial waste. Open Every Third Saturday of the Month: 7am to 2pm
RESTRICTIONS:
1. A MAXIMUM of 220 lbs. is accepted from each resident.
2. The waste must be in the original container and have the original label on it.
3. The container must not leak.
4. The contents must match the container label.
5. For residents of Whitfield County only.


Services are restricted to residents of Whitfield County only.
